responses: Hello! Welcome to MITU Skillologies. How can I help you?
Hi there! How may I assist you today?
MITU Skillologies is a professional training institute based in Maharashtra, focused on Data Science, Artificial Intelligence, and emerging technologies.
MITU Skillologies provides industry-oriented training programs in AI, Data Science, and open-source technologies.
Our mission is to democratize Data Science and AI education and make these technologies accessible to everyone, regardless of background.
Our training approach focuses on hands-on learning with real-world projects, case studies, and guidance from industry experts.
We offer training in Data Science, Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Python, Cloud Computing, IoT, Cyber Security, Linux, Web Development, and more.
Yes, we provide specialized training in this technology. Please contact us for course duration and enrollment details.
MITU Skillologies has conducted numerous hands-on workshops across colleges in Maharashtra on AI, Data Science, IoT, Python, and Machine Learning.
We conduct Faculty Development Programs (FDPs) for engineering colleges on Data Science, AI, IoT, Cyber Security, and Machine Learning.
MITU Skillologies actively participates in social initiatives such as distributing inspirational books to schools on Reading Motivation Day.
You can contact MITU Skillologies at +91 9960163010 or email contact@mitu.co.in. Offices are located in Pune and Nashik.
MITU Skillologies offers career and internship opportunities. Please contact us via email for current openings.
We provide a wide range of study materials and presentations related to AI, Data Science, Python, IoT, and other technologies.
MITU Skillologies regularly shares updates, blogs, and collaborations such as MoUs with engineering colleges.
